explanation:
code_hardening: No additional state validation was added because the instance fields num, n, and r are initialized and validated in the constructor and the original algorithm assumes valid state.
resolve_compilation_errors: Removed all parameters from the method signature and replaced references to num, n, and r with the corresponding instance fields already present in the class.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: Updated the method to operate purely on instance fields while preserving the exact algorithm and return semantics from the Stack Overflow snippet.
refactoring: Changed the method from public static final to a private instance method and renamed it from getNext to nextNum to match the existing call graph.
misc: Applied minor formatting consistent with the surrounding class style; no new custom API calls were introduced.
